document.full_text: the consumer price index data for march was "in line with low underlying inflation," a top u.s. federal reserve official said on friday, adding it is too early to determine whether commodity price spikes are playing a role.
document.title: fed's evans says underlying inflation still low
lines_and_colors: the consumer price index data for march was "in line with low underlying inflation," a top u.s. federal reserve official said on friday, adding it is too early to determine whether commodity price spikes are playing a role.
